评论详情: purchased as an anniversary gift and the wife loves it!
I LOVE wearing this wearable work of art.
The one thing that was a surprise was that the silk is not a slippery type of silk.

I love the fit, length but it wrinkles bad. After I wash I hang to dry, and it is wrinkled, not what I had hoped for. I was wanting something special, for when guests are staying overnight. This is not it.

评论概述: My new favorite thing in my entire wardrobe.
评论详情: I owned an antique silk white kimono robe for over 10 years, and after the threads began to tire, I searched for a new silk robe to carry me into my hearty 30’s. I read about the company — saw this brand was woman owned, with communal and ancestral spirit. Anyway the end of the story is I love this new robe so much, it is all I could have hoped for. I feel sexy, thermoregulated (yes I’m a nerd) and comfortable at the same time. Cheers.

The robe is very beautiful, however it just didn't fit me well. Tara, the seller was very understanding and wrote me a personal responce and will process my refund as soon as she receives the garmet back.  Very pleasant experience with Tara, the owner and seller.
